description: Realizing the MDGs in Lao PDR - Consolidated Programme of Support to MPI for the Achievement of the Valuable Goals of the 7th NSEDP 2011-15

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The main objective of the Component 1 is to strengthen the capacity of MPI to translate the five-year NSEDP into effective results-based annual implementation plans, including public investment programmes, aiming at securing continual progress towards the valuable goals of the NSEDP. 
Output 1. Support the incorporation of poverty reduction and MDG priorities into the 7th NSEDP (2001-2015), annual plans, budgets and prioritized in Public Investment Programmes (PIPs) 
Output 2. Support the regular conducting of macroeconomic analysis to inform the Government on key macroeconomic issues that may have implications for the country’s plans 
Output 3. Support capacity building for local planning and implementation at the central and local levels 
Output 4. Support to ensure the enhanced capacity of MPI and planners at selected districts/provinces to monitor and report on the plan implementation through and improved monitoring framework and tools 
Output 5. Support capacity building for the MDG and LDC Secretariats to coordinate, advocate and facilitate progress towards the MDGs and implementation of the LDC plan of action
donor_long: GUANGXI STORA ENSO FORESTRY CO LTD
subproject.title: MPI Programme 2011-2015-NSEDP

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacities to integrate into the global economic system and to negotiate and manage traditional & emerging development finance for inclusive development
subproject.description: The objective of this component on RTP is to further strengthen MPI capacity to lead effective mobilization and coordination of ODA for the achievement of NSEDP, especially the MDGs and advancing the country towards graduation from LDC status through the Round Table Process.
subproject.title: MPI Programme 2011-2015-RTP

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The main objective of this project is to strengthen the monitoring of the 7th Plan implementation and progress towards the MDGs. This will be achieved through improvement of the common database (LaoInfo)
subproject.title: MPI Programme 2011-2015LaoInfo

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project aims to further develop government capacity to undertake applied policy research on strategically-selected Human Development that will help inform the formulation of annual NSEDP implementation plans, and the formulation of the 8th NSEDP
subproject.title: MPI Programme 2011-2015-NHDR

title: MPI Programme 2011-2015
